content: > like the elbrook cowl be sure to check out the elbrook hat 1 as well and be on the lookout for the elbrook sweater testing call coming soon check my instagram > this pattern is knit with murky depths targhee worsted check it out here 2 you can get a hat and a cowl out of one skein of each color the elbrook hat is an instant-gratification colorwork sprint knit up in cozy worsted weight yarn highly recommend murky depth s targhee worsted this hat will be off your needles and on your head before you know it **sizes** finished measurements 22 5 28 25 / 57 72 cm circumference 10 / 25 5 cm height both sizes sample is shown in size 1 **yarn** mc 170 215 yards / 155 200 meters worsted weight yarn shown in murky depths dyeworks targhee worsted in colorway kid glove 100% non-superwash targhee 280 yards / 256 meters per 4 ounce / 115 gram skein cc1 60 75 yards / 55 70 meters worsted weight yarn shown in murky depths dyeworks targhee worsted in colorway blood oath 100% non-superwash targhee 280 yards / 256 meters per 4 ounce / 115 gram skein cc2 35 45 yards / 30 40 meters worsted weight yarn shown in murky depths dyeworks targhee worsted in colorway dark slate 100% non-superwash targhee 280 yards / 256 meters per 4 ounce / 115 gram skein **needles and gauge** 4 / 10 cm = 17 sts and 24 row in stockinette blocked us size 6 and 8 needles used in the sample **supplies** stitch markers yarn needle techniques - tutorial links included in the pattern reading a colorwork chart latvian braid this pattern has been professionally tech edited - thank you sue-cat /people/sue-cat it has also been test knit thank you to my testers 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/elbrook-hat 2 https //www etsy com/shop/murkydepths
